Title: Wavefront Object Support
Description: Support for reading of 3D objects from the standard Wavefront Object file format.  Allows dynamic loading of OBJ files into Windows Presentation Foundation 3D view ports.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Support for reading of 3D objects from the standard Wavefront Object file format. Allows dynamic loading of OBJ files into Windows Presentation Foundation 3D view ports.


For more information on Wavefront OBJ and MTL files please see:

OBJ - Wikipedia

Details of the specification can be found here:

http://local.wasp.uwa.edu.au/~pbourke/dataformats/obj/
